data.eml:eml: A new species of Peltidium Philippi, 1839 (Crustacea, Copepoda, Harpacticoida) from the Pacific coast of Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Suarez-Morales, Eduardo, Jarquin-Gonzalez, Jani (2013): A new species of Peltidium Philippi, 1839 (Crustacea, Copepoda, Harpacticoida) from the Pacific coast of Mexico. ZooKeys 325: 21-32, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.325.5726, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.325.5726
